text: Kate Olivia Malone (born 29 January 1959) in London, is a British potter and ceramic artist. With Keith Brymer Jones, she judges BBC2â€™s The Great Pottery Throw Down. She is known for her large sculptures and using bright colors. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Artists from London Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire
title: Kate Malone
